The team’s priorities are focused on strong governance, transparency, strategic engagement, and fostering a diverse and inclusive culture that develops our talent.

title: Program Associate
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  


* The Transformations, Programs and Governance Team is looking for an experienced associate level candidate to Join our dynamic team as a Project Manager/Business Analyst. In this role, you'll spearhead project planning, coordinate cross-functional teams, and analyze business processes to drive efficiency. Your expertise will be crucial in delivering successful projects, ensuring timelines are met, and aligning initiatives with strategic goals. If you thrive in a collaborative environment, possess excellent communication skills, and have a proven track record in project management or business analysis, we'd love to have you on board!
**Job Responsibilities:**

* Lead and execute complex projects, programs and initiatives from inception through to delivery
* Support the completion of Project Life Cycle deliverables that include documentation of Business Requirements, Design/ Approach, Operating Model, Testing and Production Readiness (as necessary)
* Track project performance, specifically to analyse the successful completion of short and long-term goals
* Act as the bridge between Operations, Technology and Product Development (amongst others)
* Organise and manage communications with stakeholders and senior managers
* Estimate, design and manage the delivery of scalable solutions including Intelligent Automation and Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning aligned to a business strategy.
* Partner with stakeholders at various levels to identify process re-engineering opportunities, create business cases, quantify benefits and identify high priority projects.
* Own process discovery to help identify potential process inefficiencies, find suitable solutions and design the Target Operating Model to improve the client experience and achieve strategic goals.
* Assess regulations impacts across the various dimensions (people, process, systems) and implement changes to meet compliance timelines
* Apply a commercial mindset to deliver efficiently and consistently across teams and the wider organisation
* Use Data Modelling techniques to provide better business intelligence
* Implement process improvement through adoption and creation of industry tools: Alteryx, UiPath, workflow tools

**Required qualification, skills and capabilities:**

* 7-10 years’ experience in project management and agile methodology working on technology related projects
* Understanding of banking products and investment banking
* Strong organizational skills, design thinking and analytical skills including all Microsoft applications.
* Delivering innovative solutions that improve client experience and reduce costs to the firm.
* Detailed oriented, with the ability to manage multiple tasks while maximizing quality of service
* Flexible attitude in dealing with multiple tasks
* Working knowledge in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) as well as new age tools of No-Code No-Code like Alteryx, UiPath, Pega, Instabase, Tableau and Power BI.
* Ability to work under pressure and to deadlines, with accountability and responsibility for owning actions
* Master’s degree and/or PMP certifications will carry significant preference

title: Application Support Engineer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**  

This position is for a Senior SAP Basis Administrator, for the Global SAP ECC 6.0 System which is used as the Domestic Ledger system and SAP BW 7.x on NetWeaver platform is used for reporting. The SAP Senior Basis Administrator is responsible for the management of the SAP environment and integration with external application components. He / she responsible to configure, monitor, recommend and tune the SAP Application components to ensure every integration layers (ABAP, DB, Network, Storage & Backup Layer) are fully functional based on business requirements. The SAP Basis Administrator is responsible for the installation, upgrade, and maintenance of SAP systems. Additional areas include the evaluation and design of interfaces, between SAP and external systems, maintenance of the SAP Data Dictionary and database objects, and manage the migration of SAP database and application configuration from development to production systems.

**JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM) is a leading global financial services firm with assets of trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. The firm is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers, small business and commercial banking, financial transaction processing, asset management, and private equity.**  



**Responsibilities and duties:**

* Daily administration, monitoring, troubleshooting, and tuning of SAP ECC 6.0, S/4 HANA, B4 HANA on HANA 2.0 platform with GRC or SOLUTION MANAGER integration
* Perform SAP software installation, upgrades, applying support packages, system copies/refreshes and installation add-on software components.
* Responding to and resolving infrastructure related incidents & problems
* Works with OS & DB Administrators for optimal SAP Performance
* Provide Support and Guidance to the other Project and Development teams during the build and QA cycle testing
* Provides local and remote site resiliency recovery processes across multiple SAP products to meet cyber resiliency requirements
* Provide all technical support to monitor proactively during critical processing period
* Perform system analysis across multiple layers and provide recommended approaches to improve system performance.
* Participate in multi-landscape design solutions, architecture recommendations, and strategies for continuous improvement.
* Maintain multi-landscape environments through remote copies, system refreshes, and transport management monitoring.
* Provide daily business process support for all the integrations from and to the SAP ECC, S/4 HANA. B4HANA and GRC applications and ensure all components are fully functional at all times
* Perform Daily System Health Checks on all SAP systems and do general troubleshooting and diagnostics checks on technical aspects of the system.
* Configure and Maintain Transport System Landscapes and operate Change Management Tools
* Provide Production Support 24x7 support with on-call responsibilities
* Work with SAP via OSS & Solution Manager to technical resolve problems

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related business field: or equivalent experience.
* Working understanding of complex software and information technology solutions.
* 12-15+ years working with SAP administration with demonstrated experience related to support, maintenance, and implementation projects.
* 8+ years’ experience with UNIX or LINUX platform preferably AIX 7.X or RHEL 8.X / 9.X operating systems
* 4 -5+ years of HANA 2.0 experience to support multi landscape system
* Able to work independently as well as coordinate with business and technical teams
* Good working knowledge using bash shell Scripting or python scripting will be value added but not essential
* Certified in any of the cloud platforms (AWS / AZURE / GCP / internal cloud solutions with third parties)
* Ability to mentor and provide technical guidance to internal and external teams




**Desired technologies:**

S/4 HANA FP01/FP02 and B4 HANA with NetWeaver integration components (Web dispatcher, LDAP-plugins, SNC, SSO and SPNEGO) on RHEL / SUSE LINUX platform, ECC 6.0 on AIX 7.3 with Oracle 19c database. Experience on the IBM Power Platform with any cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud and other vendor-based cloud solutions)


**ABOUT US**  

JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.  

  

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  

  

Our Corporate Technology team relies on smart, driven people like you to develop applications and provide tech support for all our corporate functions across our network. Your efforts will touch lives all over the financial spectrum and across all our divisions: Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and within the Corporate Administrative Office. You’ll be part of a team specifically built to meet and exceed our evolving technology needs, as well as our technology controls agenda.

title: Indexer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION** **Short Description**


We seek a candidate with an aptitude for fixed income markets and is passionate about workflows and data analysis. The individual will help develop index methodologies for Fixed Income asset class. The individual is expected to achieve a firm grasp of index products and function as the primary point of contact in the time zone. Attention to detail and organizational skills are essential.

**Posting Description**


J.P.Morgan’s Global ResearchCenter (GRC) in Mumbai was set up in August,2003 as an extension of the Firm’s Global Equity Research teams around the world. Besides working with JP Morgan’s Equity Research teams, the analysts and associates in GRC are now engaged with other areas of public side research including Credit Research, Economics, Strategy, Credit Derivatives and Fixed Income Bond indices.




The Global Index Research Group is responsible for the ideation and management of its market leading Fixed Income indices across Developed, Emerging and Frontier markets. The group has expanded its reach to cover other asset classes and investing strategies, including ESG, Securitized and Commodities, to name a few. The team works with large institutional asset managers and hedge funds, central banks, pension funds and sovereign wealth funds.


Ideal candidates for this position would be Engineering graduates who have an interest in benchmarks, portfolio construction and risk management. An experience of 1-2 years in the financial services in a similar role and aspirations to build a career in the financial markets is desirable.




Job Responsibilities


* Work with both internal stakeholders and external clients to educate them on the index products, any structural and tactical changes, and the associated implications for the relevant markets resulting from these changes.
* Work across all stages of Index product development process from conceptualization of idea to putting it into production, through leveraging partnerships across technology, operations and other stakeholders.
* Work comfortably with large datasets and ability to dissect, process and analyze data and analytics at the component and aggregate level.
* Participate in team publishing and reporting initiatives including BAU market summaries and thematic publications. Draft and update index rules where needed to ensure dissemination of accurate information.
* Manage Index oversight function through engagement with the Calculation Agent teams for daily monitoring of our indices & ensure product integrity is maintained.
* Put together research and analysis on index products to assist clients and teams globally.




Essential Skills, Experience, and Qualifications* Strong work ethic, ability to think locally & execute globally with high social awareness.
* A background in quantitative research within an index or portfolio construction environment is desirable.
* Understanding of fixed income concepts, bond math, financial products, analytics, and an awareness of market events.
* Strong verbal and written communication skills, with ability to explain complex or unfamiliar concepts in simple terms.




Preferred qualifications, capabilities, and skills* Any hands-on experience with programming and database packages would be a plus.

Interested applicants could email their CV to Viquar Shaikh at: viquar.shaikh@jpmorgan.com .

Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.

  

  

  

**ABOUT THE TEAM**  


The Corporate & Investment Bank is a global leader across investment banking, wholesale payments, markets and securities services. The world’s most important corporations, governments and institutions entrust us with their business in more than 100 countries. We provide strategic advice, raise capital, manage risk and extend liquidity in markets around the world.  

  

Clients turn to our industry-leading Markets, Sales and Research team to offer clients unique market insights on sectors and companies, and actionable ideas using research to make well-informed investment decisions. Teams understand products across asset classes and help clients structure solutions that manage risk, enhance yield and solve complex financial problems.

title: Program Manager
description:
**What you’ll do:**
-------------------



If you desire to be part of something special, to be part of a winning team, to be part of a fun team – winning is fun. We are looking forward tohire **Program Manager I** in **Pune, India.** In Eaton, making our work exciting, engaging, meaningful; ensuring safety, health, wellness; and being a model of inclusion & diversity are already embedded in **who we are - it’s in our values, part of our vision, and our clearly defined aspirational goals. This exciting role offers opportunity to**:


* The primary responsibility is to ensure that key customer focused projects are completed and successfully launched in terms of budget, scope and resources.
* Manage 4-5 VAVE/NPI projects at a time. Candidate must have background or experience in program management in automobile industry.
* This includes driving of the projects from initializing- strategizing, planning - schedule, cost, budget analysis and budget keeping, resource management; Execution - Conflict resolution, know how of the processes of core functions as Supply chain management, manufacturing, sales & marketing, product strategy, engineering etc. ; Control - Good communicator and listener, ability to manage a team and drive things, ensuring risks are well described, documented and resolution plan is laid out.
* Should be aware about digital tools & advanced reporting & planning systems in Program Management function.
* Candidate should have good financial acumen to understand the business priorities.
* Organizing programs and activities in accordance with the timelines, budget & resource requirements.
* Developing a budget and operating plan for the program.
* Developing an evaluation method to assess program strengths and identify areas for improvement.
**Qualifications:**
-------------------



Requirement:

* Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering
* More than 8 years of experience
* Minimum 3-4 years of experience in Program Management
**Skills:**
-----------


* Project Management Institute (PMI) accreditation (SAPM or PMP) highly recommended.
* High proficiency in planning & exceution of change management / product development cycle management, risk management, Cost/ budget management"
* Excellent communication & interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work effectively in team environment and independently.
* Demonstrated problem-solving ability and an innovative mind set.
* Strategic planning ability and strong organizational skills.
* Analyzing program risks and work along with the team to formulate the mitigation plan.
* Communicates effectively to internal & external stakeholders
* Digital Mindest - should be aware about digital tools & advanced reporting & planning systems in Program Management function.
* Meeting with stakeholders to make communication easy and transparent regarding project issues and decisions on services.
* Producing accurate and timely reporting of program status throughout its life cycle.
* Managing and working with a team with a diverse array of talents, responsibilities and global locations.
* Implementing and managing changes and interventions to ensure project goals are achieved.

title: Team Lead
description:
* Bachelor's degree
* Speak, write, and read fluently in English
* Experience with Microsoft Office products and applications


At Amazon, we're working to be the most customer-centric company on earth. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people. Amazon is seeking Team leads for our transportation team. Amazon is one of the most recognizable brand names in the world and we distribute millions of products each year to our loyal customers
  
  

We're seeking a Team lead for our Delivery center. In this role you will be responsible for shift operations at our DCs and support the DC manager in performance management and driving the operational plan.
  
  

**Title:** Team Lead
  
**Location:** India
  
  

Essential Functions
  
  

Defining , building and executing the delivery process from delivery station to customer address
  
  

Ensure enough bandwidth in territorial delivery team to ensure peak time delivery management
  
  

Engage closely with the delivery team including associates, developing and maintaining a highly motivated and
  
performance driven team.
  
  

Continuously improve the delivery process and attain a sustained level of delivery performance, through process
  
and training improvements. Initiates improvements to enhance quality standards, reduce waste, and eliminate
  
unnecessary work.
  
  

Analysis of the data reports to identify performance bottlenecks and improve performance
  
  

Implement the formal process control and process improvement mechanisms such as Kaizen
  
Essential Skills
  
  

Strong leadership capabilities and people management skills
  
  

Ability to work under pressure situations
  
  

Ability to work in ambiguous situations
  
  

Good communication skills. Ability to communicate and exp lain to individuals & the team, what needs to be
  
achieved for the Delivery Center /Amazon to achieve its objectives. Listening skills: Gains input and commitment
  
from all involved in delivering their specific part.
  
  

**Strong Bias for great customer service:** Engage the Team in developing their understanding of Customer
  
Experience and knowledge of what Customers actually needs/expects.
  
  

**High Ownership:** Follows through to ensure the delivery of changes/solutions/services that fulfill the Customer’s
  
needs.
  
  

**Analytic al Skills:** Effectively analyses and interpret information, identifying & validating the key facts, including
  
reviewing alternatives to determine advantages and associated risks.
  
  

A day in the life
  
  

About the hiring group
  
  

Job responsibilities
  
  

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Vadodara, GJ, IND

title: Product Manager
description:
**Be part of something bigger!**

  


As the world and the way people live is changing, at Bekaert we believe it’s our responsibility to contribute to finding new solutions for the future. Our ambition is to be the leading partner for shaping the way we live and move. And to always do this the Bekaert Way – safe, smart, and sustainable.


With a heritage of more than 140 years, we continue to strengthen our core competencies that have made Bekaert a global market and technology leader in material science of steel wire transformation and coating technologies. Today, we also apply our expertise beyond steel to create new solutions with innovative materials and services for markets including new mobility, low-carbon construction, and green energy.


As a dynamic and growing company with over 27,000 employees worldwide, 75 nationalities, a retention rate above 90% and almost € 7 billion in combined revenue in 2022, we're looking for someone like you to join our team!

  


**Why join us?**


* Personal Growth – Let us help you unlock your full potential
* Pioneering – Join us to challenge the impossible
* Creativity - Discover possibilities beyond steel
* Purpose – Drive progress for our planet and people
* Diversity – Together, we create change

  


#### **About the role**


#### **As Delivery lead for Customer portals, you represent the "quality and voice of the product" by setting the overall strategic vision and roadmap for the product. You will be responsible for success against identified metrics, managing the product's ROI, and setting short- and long-term product objectives, and ensuring that the product team works together effectively. responsibilities with the product owners, solution architects and identifies technology solutions to meet business and financial objectives.**


#### **Your Impact**


* #### **Collaborate with the Business area to define and implement the commercial IT roadmap for the customer portals, ecommerce sites and integrated platforms. You will also be responsible for streamlining product operations in line with the organization’s business objectives.**
* #### **Collaborate with the business team and delivery team and work according to Agile methodology and guide teams with respect to best practices in delivery.**
* #### **Collaborate with product owners and other internal/external stakeholders to define requirements and priorities. Drafting and driving product release plans.**
* #### **Drives the design, prioritization, and management of customer experiences of product tracks. Engages business stakeholders in identifying technology-based innovation opportunities.**
* #### **Steers technology vision, direction, and architecture for product tracks. Advocates the use of common source components versus building duplicate functionality, reducing technical debt while driving new capabilities.**
* #### **Align IT's operational SLAs and KPIs with those of the sales and marketing functions. Manage business escalations and drive solutions through interventions when necessary.**
* #### **Ensure strong alignment with enterprise-wide governance, security and compliance practices through continuous collaboration and necessary interventions.**
* #### **Manage communications and ensure visibility of product development and results.**
* #### **Build a world-class Digital Engineering team. Develop team capabilities and manage deployment to provide customer-centric design and implementation support.**
* #### **Ensure teams have the right skills and composition to deliver quickly and respond to emerging requirements with an agile approach.**
* #### **Manage budget and third-party resource allocation, negotiate contracts with suppliers and promote relevant cost-saving initiatives.**

#### **About You**


#### **Essential skills & competencies**


* #### **9+ years of overall experience,****5+ years into project/programmanagement of commercial/customer solutions**
* **Must have from MBA IT /Operations as education background form B schoo**l
* #### **Experience in managing globally distributed Product****Teams**
* #### **Experience in delivering products from scratch and seen the product lifecycle****.**
* #### **Broad and deep knowledge of various aspects of an enterprise and customer-facing technology architecture such as business, information, data, infrastructure, and security.**
* #### **Strong business and leadership skills and good experience with technology to deliver commercial solutions****(Digital commerce (B2B, B2C), NPS, customer service, integration with ERP (SAP SD)).**
* #### **Demonstrated experience in product leadership and commercial solutions preferably with Adobe Experience Manager and Microsoft Dynamics.**
* #### **Knowledge of existing, new, and emerging technologies and ability to practically apply them to new business designs and business models to achieve targeted business results.**
* #### **Good understanding of product management****.**
* #### **Good understanding of design thinking, test-driven development, and software test automation processes.**
* #### **Good analytical, planning, organizational and technical skills. A voice of reason and authority to make tough decisions.**
* #### **Good written and verbal communication skills****.**

**Will you dare to take the next step?**

  


Join us to unlock your full potential AND have a true impact in pushing the boundaries of what is possible.


We're looking for individuals who are not afraid to take risks and explore new ideas. If you are passionate about personal growth and bringing your authentic self to work, we want you on our team!


At Bekaert, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

  


To learn more about us and our exciting career opportunities, visit Bekaert Careers
